summary: Passengers are entitled to up to 1288 SDR compensation for lost or damaged baggage. For delayed baggage: 148 SDR on day 1 and 60 SDR/day after, up to 1288 SDR.
Passengers receive 50 SDR for delays over 3 hours, and 150 SDR for delays over 6 hours. Care and support rights apply (food, accommodation).
If flight is canceled, compensation depends on notice period. Ranges from 50% to 150% of the unused flight segment + full refund.
